name: Fearness [ VR Prototype ]
description:
“... Don’t move away from the light, they will attack you only if you don’t look at them, turn your back and you're dead ! There are many more than you think, don’t take your eyes off them ! But the most important thing is… #%?&@ ”

Fearness is a VR game prototype created in 3 days as part of an entrepreneurial project, the goal is to improve the project and make it a full version within a few month.

And I NEED YOU !!! If you like the game, would you have a few minutes to complete a quick quiz ? It will be a precious help for the success of my journey ! ( Link below )

Fearness is a VR Horror game, survive as long as possible against "them", good luck...

- For Oculus Rift, 360°, upright

Expected additions : 

  • Skin of “them” 
  • Several levels / environments with specific difficulties 
  • Usable items (Flashlight, Glowstick) 
  • Sound atmosphere and dynamic lighting

Link to the Google Form : https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeKKYjizWDm6RuRYDPwdFQg014_VA8_N2m5T3hMz8Yr3H-MLA/viewform?usp=pp_url

CAUTION: NOT APPROPRIATE FOR PERSONS WITH EPILEPTICS OR HEART PROBLEMS!
